sentence.Network_en: Fundamentally, women like him for his sensitivity and charming vulnerability.
sentence.Network_cn: 基本说来，女人喜欢他是因为他细腻的情感和迷人的文弱气质。

sentence.Network_en: I don't think it has fundamentally altered the sport.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为它并没有从根本上改变这项运动。

sentence.Network_en: Language is something which fundamentally distinguishes humans from animals.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言是将人类与动物区分开来的基本特征。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 她根本就不适合做办公室工作.  来自《简明英汉词典》  2. Their approach to the problem is fundamentally misguided. 他们解决这个问题的方法从根本上说是判断.
英汉字典_爱问知识人 ... fully 充分地完全地至少 fundamentally 基础地根本地 furnish 供应供给装备.
四级真题词汇 - 豆丁网 ... fully 充分地 fundamentally 根本上 gradually 逐渐地.
初中英语重点单词_百度知道 ... violently adv. 强暴地；猛烈地 fundamentally adv. 基本地；根本地 fundament n. 基础；根本.

list.abs: 电子工程专业词汇英语(-K) ... fundamental oscillation 基波振荡 fundamental research 基础研究 fundamental units 基本单位.
数学词汇英语翻译(F-M) ... fundamental transformation 基本变换 fundamental unit 基本单位 fundamentals 原理.
fundamental substance 棕腐质fundamental theorem 基本定理fundamental wave 基波
terminology - One-acter - 博客大巴 ... frustrate 使受挫折 fundamental law 基本法 fundamental right 基本权利.

entry.tran: (表示强调)基本地，从根本上说
entry.def: You use fundamentally for emphasis when you are stating an opinion, or when you are making an important or general statement about something.

example.ex: Fundamentally, women like him for his sensitivity and charming vulnerability...
example.tran: 基本说来，女人喜欢他是因为他细腻的情感和迷人的文弱气质。

example.ex: He can be very charming, but he is fundamentally a bully...
example.tran: 他有时也会表现得很有魅力，但他本质上还是一个恃强凌弱的恶棍。

entry.def: You use fundamentally to indicate that something affects or relates to the deep, basic nature of something.

example.ex: He disagreed fundamentally with the President's judgment...
example.tran: 他从根本上反对总统的判断。

example.ex: I don't think it has fundamentally altered the sport...
example.tran: 我认为它并没有从根本上改变这项运动。

means.word_mean: 1. at bottom or by one's (or its) very nature;

sentences.sentence: "the argument was essentially a technical one"
"for all his bluster he is in essence a shy person"

auth_sentence.content: Every example you've provided has been fundamentally flawed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every example you've provided has been fundamentally flawed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every example you've provided has been fundamentally flawed.

auth_sentence.content: The problem is you failed fundamentally on many levels.
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem is you failed fundamentally on many levels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem is you failed fundamentally on many levels.

auth_sentence.content: This is why religious logic is so fundamentally flawed!
auth_sentence.res_content: This is why religious logic is so fundamentally flawed!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is why religious logic is so fundamentally flawed!

sentences.en: The book presents a fundamentally distorted picture.
sentences.cn: 该书所描绘的情景是对真相的根本歪曲。

sentences.en: Their approach to the problem is fundamentally misguided.
sentences.cn: 他们解决这个问题的方法从根本上说是判断错误的。
